text: @PippaCrerar Boris Johnson told his Italian counterpart, Giuseppe Conte, that the UK was aiming for “herd immunity” even though there is no evidence we become immune to COVID-19 for any significant length time - the PM's easing of lockdown strategy is dangerous.
